scripts.dev: npx tailwindcss -i ./templates/public/app.css -o ../templates/public/app.css && npx esbuild ./templates/public/app.js --outfile=../templates/public/app.js --bundle && cp ./templates/public/favicon.ico ../templates/public/favicon.ico && cp ./templates/*.html ../templates
scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i ./templates/public/app.css -o ../templates/public/app.css --minify && npx esbuild ./templates/public/app.js --outfile=../templates/public/app.js --bundle --minify && cp ./templates/public/favicon.ico ../templates/public/favicon.ico && cp ./templates/*.html ../templates
